channel.title: 🏢 Monash University on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 Monash University on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: FasMe: Fast and Sample-efficient Meta Estimator for Precision Matrix Learning in Small Sample Settings
item.description: FasMe: a novel meta-learning approach delivers fast and sample-efficient precision matrix estimation, surpassing existing methods in accuracy and speed for small sample datasets.
